title: Keladi Kanmani Lyrics Puthu Puthu Arthangal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Keladi Kanmani
paadagan sangadhi
nee idhai ketpadhaal
nenjil orr nimmadhi

naal muludhum paarvayil
naan ezhudhum
por kadhayai unakena
naan koora.

ennaalum naan yaerem
..
pirarkkaaga naan paadum
thirai paadalthaan

innaalil thaney naan
isaithaen ammaa
enakkaaga naan paadum
mudhal paadal thaan

naan pota poomaalai
manam serkkavillai
neethaaney enakkaaga
madal pooththa mullai.

Keladi Kanmani
paadagan sangadhi
nee idhai ketpadhaal
nenjil orr nimmadhi

naan vaadum neram
un maarpodu thaan
nee ennai
thaalaattum
thaai allavaaa.

kaal pona paadhaigal
naan pona podhu
kai serthu neethaney
mei sertha maadhu.

Keladi Kanmani
paadagan sangadhi
nee idhai ketpadhaal
nenjil orr nimmadhi

naal muludhum paarvayil
naan ezhudhum
por kadhayai unakena
naan koora.
